analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu atikkamma māradheyyaṁ ādiccova virocati.
analyzed: tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu atikkamma māradheyyam ādiccaḥ uva virocati

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, asekhena samādhikkhandhena samannāgato hoti, asekhena paññākkhandhena samannāgato hoti—
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu asekhena sīla kkhandhena samannāgataḥ hoti asekhena samādhi kkhandhena samannāgataḥ hoti asekhena paññā kkhandhena samannāgataḥ hoti

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu atikkamma māradheyyaṁ ādiccova virocatī”ti.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu atikkamma māradheyyam ādiccaḥ uva virocati iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
